attributes.action: Defund the London fireworks display from tax payer and make it pay per view.
attributes.additional_details: Stop using tax receipts to pay for the London fireworks.
attributes.background: Defund the use of Tax receipts to support fireworks in London.  Secular themes like BLM  Incite entitlemen frankly ALM.  Please sell tickets for access to special viewing areas instead which is on an opt in basis and budget accordingly.  Use the money to pay for other more vital things.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Authority, as well as a broadcasting decision for the BBC.
